sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental, out of turn) Once per game session, when the character inflicts a Critical Injury with an unarmed attack, they may suffer 3 strain to change the result to any Hard (3 difficulty dice) Critical Injury result. Combat checks to activate this talent cannot be made with any weapons.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Precision Strike (Supreme)</name> <number>TAL0001307</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-01-26 16:02:16</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ebafc8ad2f510110e0f497eef699b666</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-01-26 16:02:16</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
